au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.action.notify
Class WindowsMsgNotifyAction

java.lang.Object
  au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.action.notify.WindowsMsgNotifyAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAction, INotifyAction
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public class WindowsMsgNotifyAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements INotifyAction

This class allows notification to be sent to users for Windows Users. The notification is sent using the msg command. The implementation assumes that the messenger service is enabled on the computer.

Author:
tmachet
